replies.body:
Is this specifically regarding using tokens to get BE directly?

If so, then one thing to consider is that Riot used to support that a lot more than they do now. Between having options for using more tokens in one go (I believe you could exchange 50 at a time at one point), and having a higher exchange rate (I believe it peaked at 1 token to 10 BE), it certainly seems that Riot is moving *away* from supporting that.

Personally, I don't like what Riot have done with that, but I also don't think there's going to be enough feedback from the community wanting this stuff back.
